0fce7cd5-55d8-4b02-9e21-5f7d5d685eca.description: The Professional in Human Resources (PHR) certification is recognized as a professionally relevant credential for those who have mastered the technical and operational aspects of HR management, including knowledge of US laws and regulations. HRCI retains sole ownership of the badge.
0fce7cd5-55d8-4b02-9e21-5f7d5d685eca.name: Professional in Human Resources® (PHR®)

alignments.name: NCCA Accreditation
alignments.description: The NCCA Standards were created in 1977 and updated in 2016 to ensure certification programs adhere to modern standards of practice for the certification industry.

badge_template_activities.title: A minimum of one, two or four years of professional-level HR work experience dependent on educational background
Submission and approval of application
Pass a high-stakes assessment
Maintain the credential via continuing professional development credits or passing of the high-stakes assessment again

c0a0867b-632f-433d-9f53-b2abe3e020ca.description: The Senior Professional in Human Resources (SPHR) certification is recognized as a professionally relevant credential for those who have mastered the strategic and policy-making aspects of HR management as practiced in the United States. HRCI retains sole ownership of the badge.
c0a0867b-632f-433d-9f53-b2abe3e020ca.name: Senior Professional in Human Resources® (SPHR®) Certification

alignments.name: NCCA Accreditation
alignments.description: The NCCA Standards were created in 1977 and updated in 2016 to ensure certification programs adhere to modern standards of practice for the certification industry.

badge_template_activities.title: A minimum of four, five or seven years of professional-level HR work experience dependent on educational background
Submission and approval of application
Pass a high-stakes assessment
Maintain the credential via continuing professional development credits or passing of the high-stakes assessment again

c38f4873-313a-4f1f-9a0a-400c9273b55f.description: The Associate Professional in Human Resources (aPHR) is a knowledge-based credential that is designed to certify individuals beginning their HR career journey who have successfully demonstrated foundational knowledge of Human Resources. HRCI retains sole ownership of the badge.
c38f4873-313a-4f1f-9a0a-400c9273b55f.name: Associate Professional in Human Resources® (aPHR®)

alignments.name: NCCA Accreditation
alignments.description: The NCCA Standards were created in 1977 and updated in 2016 to ensure certification programs adhere to modern standards of practice for the certification industry.

badge_template_activities.title: Have a high school diploma or global equivalent
Submission and approval of application
Pass a high-stakes assessment
Maintain the credential via continuing professional development credits or passing of the high-stakes assessment again

b696794f-11a1-4617-af63-d22fc681d59f.description: The Professional in Human Resources – International (PHRi) is a global, competency-based credential that is designed to validate professional-level core HR knowledge and skills. The credential demonstrates mastery of generally accepted technical and operational HR principles. Independent of geographic region, the credential complements local HR practices. HRCI retains sole ownership of the badge.
b696794f-11a1-4617-af63-d22fc681d59f.name: Professional in Human Resources – International™ (PHRi™)

alignments.name: NCCA Accreditation
alignments.description: The NCCA Standards were created in 1977 and updated in 2016 to ensure certification programs adhere to modern standards of practice for the certification industry.

95035b0e-6106-42ca-aa98-794547267be3.description: The Senior Professional in Human Resources - International (SPHRi) credential demonstrates mastery of generally accepted HR principles in strategy, policy development and service delivery, independent of geographic region. Applicants for the SPHRi must demonstrate knowledge of employment law. HRCI retains sole ownership of the badge.
95035b0e-6106-42ca-aa98-794547267be3.name: Senior Professional in Human Resources - International™ (SPHRi™)

8b03e05a-e614-4da2-bdcf-b9b7cffff515.description: The Global Professional in Human Resources (GPHR) is a global, competency-based credential that is designed to validate the skills and knowledge of an HR professional who operates in a global marketplace. HRCI retains sole ownership of the badge.
8b03e05a-e614-4da2-bdcf-b9b7cffff515.name: Global Professional in Human Resources® (GPHR®)

Submission and approval of application
Pass a high-stakes assessment

28ad4a86-5a68-4fa0-bfee-18b1d8e64adc.description: The PHRca certification is designed for HR professionals who are experts in regulations and legal mandates specific to the state of California. The PHRca certification focuses on California HR-related laws and practices. HRCI retains sole ownership of the badge.

Independent of geographic region, the credential complements local HR practices. HRCI retains sole ownership of the badge.

e253ff2d-6b06-48e5-a846-1ae9dc7f5bc5.description: Earners of the Workforce Analytics upSkill micro-credential badge use people and workforce data to make fact-based management and business decisions for their organizations. They know how to gather and analyze data, identify business problems or opportunities, define methods and metrics to use for evaluation, identify data sources and variables to evaluate a program or opportunity, document, and present data findings and recommendations, and implement and evaluate recommendations.
e253ff2d-6b06-48e5-a846-1ae9dc7f5bc5.name: Workforce Analytics upSkill Micro-Credential

badge_template_activities.title: Must complete a learning module and pass the timed Workforce Analytics assessment

62c452ba-7534-4571-bfb9-b5a8d4e2d338.description: Earners of the Risk Management upSkill micro-credential badge assess and mitigate potential or realized risks for their organization. They know how to align HR practices with organizational goals, mitigate and remediate human capital risk, comply with employment rules and regulations, and protect and enhance their organization’s reputation.
62c452ba-7534-4571-bfb9-b5a8d4e2d338.name: Risk Management upSkill Micro-Credential

badge_template_activities.title: Must complete a learning module and pass the timed Risk Management assessment

368460d9-130f-4e54-81a0-f9eb6bf11047.description: Safeguard your organization through the understanding of the legal and HR landscape, specific to the state of California. Learn how to identify and ensure compliance in legal requirements, administer benefit and leaves of absence, and implement these practices so your organization remains current and up-to-date on constantly changing legislation. Guide your organization through the challenges of California compliance and become a trusted advisor for your HR and Executive teams.
368460d9-130f-4e54-81a0-f9eb6bf11047.name: California HR

badge_template_activities.title: Must complete a learning module and pass the timed California HR assessment

441491b7-769d-40eb-aa16-ad6a59f7460d.description: Earners of the Workforce Analytics upSkill micro-learning badge use people and workforce data to make fact-based management and business decisions for their organizations. They will learn how to gather and analyze data, identify business problems or opportunities, define methods and metrics to use for evaluation, identify data sources and variables to evaluate a program or opportunity, document and present data findings and recommendations, and implement and evaluate recommendations.
441491b7-769d-40eb-aa16-ad6a59f7460d.name: Workforce Analytics upSkill Micro-Learning

badge_template_activities.title: Must complete the Workforce Analytics learning module

0046853b-94e0-48a9-b078-9f2c3bba728e.description: Create, guide, and implement a Social Media program that will drive new channels and results for your organization. Navigating and understanding the challenges of Social Media for not only individual, but organizational use can be a significant undertaking. Learn how to use Social Media to recruit best in class talent, build a credible employer brand, offer training and communication, and establish critical policies and manage compliance.
0046853b-94e0-48a9-b078-9f2c3bba728e.name: Social Media in HR

badge_template_activities.title: Must complete a learning module and pass the timed Social Media in HR assessment

2467a3be-08ba-4a5f-9d40-1e95c1d9711c.description: Earners of the Risk Management upSkill micro-learning badge assess and mitigate potential or realized risks for their organization. They will learn how to align HR practices with organizational goals, mitigate and remediate human capital risk, comply with employment rules and regulations, and protect and enhance their organization’s reputation.
2467a3be-08ba-4a5f-9d40-1e95c1d9711c.name: Risk Management upSkill Micro-Learning

badge_template_activities.title: Must complete the Risk Management learning module

64814727-6654-47c2-a38a-30cc0b12d652.description: Earners of the Confidentiality and Technology upSkill micro-credential badge assess, identify gaps, and recommend and implement solutions to keep their organization and employee data secure. They know how to support, implement and operationalize information security and privacy frameworks.
64814727-6654-47c2-a38a-30cc0b12d652.name: Confidentiality and Technology upSkill Micro-Credential

badge_template_activities.title: Must complete a learning module and pass the timed Information Security and Privacy assessment.

ec076c58-0244-462b-9183-32d661014416.description: The Senior Professional in Human Resources (SPHR) certification is recognized as a professionally relevant credential for those who have mastered the strategic and policy-making aspects of HR management as practiced in the United States. Emeritus status allows currently certified HR professionals whose status is Member-Active to continue to use their designation(s) after they retire from the HR profession. HR Certification Institute retains sole ownership of the badge.
ec076c58-0244-462b-9183-32d661014416.name: Senior Professional in Human Resources® (SPHR®) Certification - Emeritus

Must be 60 years of age or older
Must be currently retired from the HR profession

eb8d47b7-15d7-4d20-8324-a7b115883484.description: Earners of the Confidentiality & Technology upSkill micro-learning badge assess, identify gaps, and recommend and implement solutions to keep their organization and employee data secure. a262d99a-c913-42dc-8c5f-61d7ad3bea32.description: The HRSI Diversity & Inclusion (D&I) Organizational Certification empowers leaders to ensure D&I processes and practices are aligned with organizational goals and objectives, global standards and continuous improvement. HRSI helps organizations leverage and create value through certifications that meet international standards set by the International Organization for Standardization (ISO).
a262d99a-c913-42dc-8c5f-61d7ad3bea32.name: HRSI Diversity & Inclusion Organizational Certification

alignments.name: ISO 30415:2021
alignments.description: This document provides guidance on D&I for organizations, including their governance body, leaders, workforce and recognized representatives, and other stakeholders. It is intended to be scalable to the needs of all types of organizations in different sectors.

badge_template_activities.title: The certification, assessment and badge are the seal of excellence after being validated to promote an inclusive work climate and enhanced D&I employee experience based on ISO 30415:2021 HRM Diversity & Inclusion. The International Organization for Standardization's guidance on diversity and inclusion for organizations (ISO 30415:2021), is made up of voluntary members who are recognized authorities on standards, each one representing one country.

f840326f-ba22-4acc-b7a6-958d5ce03c7a.description: The PHRca certification is designed for HR professionals who are experts in regulations and legal mandates specific to the state of California. Emeritus status allows currently certified HR professionals whose status is Member-Active to continue to use their designation(s) after they retire from the HR profession. The PHRca® certification focuses on California HR-related laws and practices. HR Certification Institute retains sole ownership of the badge.
f840326f-ba22-4acc-b7a6-958d5ce03c7a.name: Professional in Human Resources - California® (PHRca®) - Emeritus
